title: Elicitation of salicylic acid and methyl jasmonate provides molecular and physiological evidence for potato susceptibility to infection by Erwinia carotovora subsp. carotovora
content:
Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Sherien E. Sobhy, Asma A. Al-Huqail, Faheema Khan, Gehad Abd-Allah Ragab, Mohamed A. El-sheikh, Asia R. Ahmed, Ahmed A. Saleh, Elsayed E. Hafez
